original: intros s eps x H1 H2. unfold seq_step, SF_cut_up in *. unfold SF_h, SF_lx in *. destruct s as [h t]. destruct t as [| [h' t']]. - simpl in H1. lia. - simpl. simpl in H1. simpl in H2. simpl in IH_seq_step. apply IH_seq_step. + simpl. apply Rle_trans with h'. * apply Rmax_l. * apply seq_step_ge_0. + simpl in H2. apply H2.
